job.title: Junior Software Engineer - Cloud Applications
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Defense & Space,Computer Software
job.description: Are you starting your career in Software Engineering Are you eager creative and passionate about creating innovative and meaningful solutions that help us solve national security problems If you are interested in using your talents to help develop nextgeneration software applications that will improve the speed and accuracy of intelligence gathering and information understanding then Expedition Technology is the team to joinltbrgtltbrgtWe are seeking juniorearlycareer Software Engineers who will work alongside a team of talented developers that are building the future of intelligence applications We hire people who are eager intellectually curious and creative while empowering them to innovate with flexibility and autonomyltbrgtltbrgtIf you join our team youll work with an extremely talented motivated supportive and welcoming team in an Agile ecosystem Youll work alongside experienced engineers while performing fullstack software development including the design development troubleshooting and debugging of cuttingedge software programs and products You will work together with your team to determine overall application design gather requirements develop tools and enhancements and deploy enterprisewide solutions Youll also help develop solutions to complex issues that involve employing creativity technical prowess and outofthebox thinking to achieve resultsltbrgtltbrgtDoes that sound like a challenge youd like to embraceltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtHere Are Some Skills That Will Help You SucceedltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtUnited States include software engineeringfocused internships of Cloudbased applicationsltligtltligtUnderstanding of cloud computing concepts and fundamentals ltligtltligtSome knowledge of AWS services such as Lambda DynamoDB RDS CloudFormation EC2 ALB IAM and SQSltligtltligtSome experience with integrating Kubernetes or other containerized ecosystems ltligtltligtUnderstanding of relational database design PolyltbrgtltligtltulgtltulgtltstronggtWho is Expedition TechnologyltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWe are a recognized leader in machine learning research and development areas including sensors and signal
